title: Sauce School Training | Sauce Labs
description: The courses here provide how-to tutorials with best practices for both beginners and experienced automation test developers. Courses cover topics including Selenium, JavaScript and Java, with how-tos and instructions on using different tools and test runners such as Mocha, JUnit, Jenkins, Sauce Labs, SauceConnect, SauceOnDemand, npm, Maven, Python, Pytest, and more.
